issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
create New project with Titanium sdk 4.0 GA
Run in emuluator or device,
Not installing provice error, 

MyCongiguratins 
Win 7, Appcelerator Studio 4.0(new one), Titanium sdk 4.0 GA

but once i change titanium sdk to 3.5 sometimes things are working..

live view also not working at all

h3. Actual Result
Not installing on a device, or emulators, 

h3. Expected Result
app to be install in device or emulator

live view to be work
fields.summary: studio 4.0 having issue, App not compiling or installing

comments.body:
Hello, I tried to reproduce the issue. It's not regenerating. The app runs on device and emulator. 

My platform Status

Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.0.1.201505170721
Appcelerator Command-Line Interface, version 4.0.0-rc
SDK 4.0.0.RC5, Since i can't find SDK 4.0.0.GA, which is's released yet in [here|http://builds.appcelerator.com.s3.amazonaws.com/index.html#4_0_X].
Android 5.0.0 Simulator, Android 4.4.4 Device.

Thanks.

hello you are correct. when i install android 5.x sdk things bit of fine... except auto viewing..

now auto viewing is not working.. 

at the same time compare to Titanium studio, Appcelerator studio is slower.. even compilation and running slow..
[~dharshana200] can we close this ticket? Please open new tickets for the other issues that you're having
Yes you can close this issue
